Name: DekkerEmote
Title: Friendly Wave
Description: Always looking to be supportive, Dekker leans on her staff and gives a friendly wave.

Name: FengMaoEmote
Title: Blade Whirl
Description: Feng Mao casually spins his blade to flaunt his formidable skill.

Name: GadgetEmote
Title: Chill Out
Description: Gadget takes a brief respite to relax on her robo-arm.

Name: GideonEmote
Title: Levitate
Description: Gideon channels the void as he levitates into the air.

Name: GrimEmote
Title: Demo Mode
Description: Demonstrates the complex motor capabilities of this Sentry Combat Robot. Floor models only - not for resale. - SCR Sales Manual, p. 29

Name: GruxEmote
Title: Battlecry
Description: Grux bangs his hammers and unleashes a mighty warlord's roar.

Name: HowitzerEmote
Title: Why I Oughta!
Description: Fueled by (liquid) courage, Howitzer springs from safety of his Mech to shake a taunting fist at his foes.

Name: IggyScorchEmote
Title: Yeehaw!
Description: Iggy provokes Scorch on purpose and rides the bull!

Name: KallariEmote
Title: Dagger Flourish
Description: Kallari deftly flourishes her daggers as she surveys the battlefield for unsuspecting foes.

Name: MurdockEmote
Title: Seven Shot Salute
Description: Murdock gets pumped up and fires celebratory shots into the air.

Name: MurielEmote
Title: Angelic Pride
Description: Muriel flaunts her beautiful wings and spins with graceful style.

Name: RiktorEmote
Title: Back to Work!
Description: Riktor cracks the whip, fair warning to any who step out of line.

Name: SevarogEmote
Title: The Babe
Description: Sevarog holds his ground and points out his next victim.

Name: SparrowEmote
Title: Yes My Liege
Description: Sparrow gracefully pays tribute to those that have fallen before her.

Name: SteelEmote
Title: Bring It On!
Description: Steel slams his shield furiously and bellows a challenge to his enemies.

Name: TwinblastEmote
Title: Watch This
Description: Twinblast displays some impressive gunplay, twirling his pistols and flipping one into the air.
